name: Cook it like Hawking
description: 'Cook it like Hawking' is a cooking simulator. It is adjusted for people with special needs, so it is possible that it can be played by only using one key. Basically the main actor is a wheel chair which is controlled by the player. The main aim of the game is to cook ordered meals and serve them to the customers. For special challenge, there are running charges, which increase continuously. Moreover, to satisfy the customers long term it is necessary to upgrade the dining area and learn new meals. Customers, which are snowmen, are adapting their food desires according to the current cooking level of player. With rising interior and enhanced meal options the player earns more money. The player also needs to be aware of the rising pile of used plates on the counter.
